    • Table

      public Table (int numberOfPlayers, boolean advancedRules)
      The constructor makes a new table with provided parameters
      Parameters:
      numberOfPlayers - is the numberOfPlayers that will play the game
      advancedRules - is the boolean to set advancedRules

    • getDeactivators

      public int getDeactivators()
      Used with advanced rules.
      Returns:
      is the number of no entries on the character card

    • islandFusion

      public void islandFusion (String position) throws GroupsOfIslandsException
      This method calculates the position of the island/s to fuse with currentIsland and then fuse them
      Parameters:
      position - ("Left", "Right" or "Both") is used to know whit which island currentIsland should be fused
      Throws:
      GroupsOfIslandsException - when there are 3 groups (islands) left (the game ends)
